EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 25 A
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Updates to tour manage page and email notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Happy New Year! This week's release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains a enhancement to the manage tour feature.
Manage Tour feature - New UI
When navigating to the manage/book a tour on top of the journey or opportunity record, the first change you will encounter is the account selector is now available before the tour booking feature.
For a refresher on the Account selector, please click the links below.
Click here for training guide Click here for Video
Once on the manage/ book a tour feature, you will notice the "Profile information" is now a required section.
If the Profile information section is greyed out, please fill in this information on the account records.
Continuing to "book tours" section, you will notice that "Tour by sales lead" field is now available for all users.
This feature allows users 3 important abilities once selecting the "Yes" option 1. The tour will be assigned to you. 2. The opportunity will be assigned to you 3. The Account will be assigned to you (if it is a Consumer Account)
Note, if you are not hosting the tour or don't wish to manage this account, please select "No" Note, Training video will be available early next week.
Email notification for Consumer sales lead.
If you are a consumer sales lead you will receive an email alert for every tour scheduled in their cluster.
As always if you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Warmly, Susie
